requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: Chem 203zL introduces more sophisticated methods for studying the reactivity of compounds. The preparation and structure elucidation of organic and organometallic compounds will be studied in the context of a research lab type setting.
prerequisites: CHEM 202ZL as prerequisite and CHEM 203Z as co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.
